name: Deep Forest - Dog Edition (Jose Altamirano)
description:
Details of Deep Forest - Dog Edition

Coding Practice:

Controls : Movement  --> W-A-S-D

Flashlight control --> Mouse

Recommendations:

- Read "Help" and "Story" screens before playing.

- Flyweight

- Strategy

- Abstract Factory

- Observer

Hope you like it!
